mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT ENAME AS "nodeCode", PARENT_ID AS "parent", PARENT_ID AS "pId", REC_ID AS "label", CNAME AS "text", 0 AS "leaf", 'cc' AS "type", #{line} AS "line", #{carEquipCode} AS "carEquipCode", #{carEquipName} AS "carEquipName" FROM T_BOM
1 = 1
AND PARENT_ID = #{node}
ORDER BY ENAME ASC

SELECT dd1.REC_ID AS "recId", dd1.TOTAL_MILES AS "totalMiles", dd1.COMPANY_CODE AS "companyCode", dd1.COMPANY_NAME AS "companyName", dd1.EQUIP_CODE AS "equipCode", dd1.EQUIP_NAME AS "equipName", dd1.MAJOR_CODE AS "majorCode", dd1.MAJOR_NAME AS "majorName", dd1.SYSTEM_CODE AS "systemCode", dd1.SYSTEM_NAME AS "systemName", dd1.EQUIP_TYPE_CODE AS "equipTypeCode", dd1.EQUIP_TYPE_NAME AS "equipTypeName", dd1.SPECIAL_EQUIP_FLAG AS "specialEquipFlag", dd1.SOURCE_KIND AS "sourceKind", dd1.MANUFACTURE AS "manufacture", dd1.ORDER_NO AS "orderNo", dd1.ORDER_NAME AS "orderName", dd1.MAT_SPECIFI AS "matSpecifi", dd1.BRAND AS "brand", dd1.MANUFACTURE_DATE AS "manufactureDate", dd1.MANUFACTURE_NO AS "manufactureNo", dd1.START_USE_DATE AS "startUseDate", dd1.END_USE_TIME AS "endUseTime", dd1.OTHER_FEATURE AS "otherFeature", dd1.MEASURE_UNIT AS "measureUnit", dd1.QUANTITY AS "quantity", dd1.IN_ACCOUNT_TIME AS "inAccountTime", dd1.PICK_NO AS "pickNo", dd1.PICK_NAME AS "pickName", dd1.EQUIP_STATUS AS "equipStatus", dd1.SOURCE_APP_NO AS "sourceAppNo", dd1.SOURCE_SUB_NO AS "sourceSubNo", dd1.SOURCE_REC_ID AS "sourceRecId", dd1.INSTALL_DEALER AS "installDealer", dd1.DOC_ID AS "docId", dd1.ORIGIN_LINE_NO AS "originLineNo", dd1.ORIGIN_LINE_NAME AS "originLineName", dd1.ORIGIN_SEG_NO AS "originSegNo", dd1.ORIGIN_SEG_NAME AS "originSegName", dd1.USE_LINE_NO AS "useLineNo", dd1.USE_LINE_NAME AS "useLineName", dd1.USE_SEG_NO AS "useSegNo", dd1.USE_SEG_NAME AS "useSegName", dd1.POSITION1_CODE AS "position1Code", dd1.POSITION1_NAME AS "position1Name", dd1.POSITION2_CODE AS "position2Code", dd1.POSITION2_NAME AS "position2Name", dd1.POSITION3 AS "position3", dd1.POSITION_REMARK AS "positionRemark", dd1.REMARK AS "remark", dd1.REC_CREATOR AS "recCreator", dd1.REC_CREATE_TIME AS "recCreateTime", dd1.REC_REVISOR AS "recRevisor", dd1.REC_REVISE_TIME AS "recReviseTime", dd1.REC_DELETOR AS "recDeletor", dd1.REC_DELETE_TIME AS "recDeleteTime", dd1.DELETE_FLAG AS "deleteFlag", dd1.ARCHIVE_FLAG AS "archiveFlag", dd1.REC_STATUS AS "recStatus", dd1.EXT1 AS "ext1", dd1.EXT2 AS "ext2", dd1.EXT3 AS "ext3", dd1.EXT4 AS "ext4", dd1.EXT5 AS "ext5" FROM T_EQUIPMENT dd1
dd1.MAJOR_CODE='07' and dd1.APPROVAL_STATUS='30'
order by dd1.EQUIP_CODE asc

SELECT REC_ID, ENAME, CNAME, PARENT_ID, IS_LEAF, COMPANY_CODE, STATUS, TBLNAME, RELATION_ID, SORT_INDEX, QUANTITY, MEASURE_UNIT, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, TREE_ID FROM T_BOM where DELETE_FLAG='0'
and PARENT_ID=#{parentId}
and ENAME LIKE '%' || #{code} || '%'
and CNAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
order by SORT_INDEX, ENAME asc

SELECT REC_ID, ENAME, CNAME, PARENT_ID, IS_LEAF, COMPANY_CODE, STATUS, TBLNAME, RELATION_ID, SORT_INDEX, QUANTITY, MEASURE_UNIT, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, TREE_ID FROM T_BOM where DELETE_FLAG='0' and REC_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOM ( REC_ID, ENAME, CNAME, PARENT_ID, IS_LEAF, STATUS, TBLNAME, RELATION_ID, SORT_INDEX, QUANTITY, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, TREE_ID) VALUES (#{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ' ', ' ', #{sortIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', #{treeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_BOM SET
ENAME = #{ename},
CNAME = #{cname},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId},
IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf},
STATUS = #{status},
SORT_INDEX = #{sortIndex},
QUANTITY = #{quantity},
TREE_ID = #{treeId},
REC_REVISOR = #{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME = #{recReviseTime} where REC_ID = #{recId}
mapper.insert:
insert ALL
INTO T_BOM ( REC_ID, ENAME, CNAME, PARENT_ID, IS_LEAF, STATUS, SORT_INDEX, QUANTITY, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#{bom.ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bom.ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bom.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bom.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', '0', '0', '1', #{bom.recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bom.recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
